## preparation
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## load the dataset
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

## describe the dataset
```{r}
skimr::skim(penguins)
```

## calculate the size
```{r}
nrow(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
```

## calculate the mean
```{r}
mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm,na.rm = TRUE)
```
